name: Getting Through It
description:
Formerly a snow climber, you woke up as one of the tools that fell from the climb that claimed your life amongst dozens. You have nothing else than the obstacles presented to you and the mountain you were climbing imposing itself amongst the other landscapes.

Controls -

LMB - Click to move

Cursor - Point where you wish to go

A prototype by Christopher Rayos with free assets from the Unity Store.

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME-

1. Just download the zip file.

2. Extract the files and enter to play the game.
